Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.world

Class World

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.world.World
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStrategy<InfluenceStrategy>
public class World extends Object implements HasStrategy<InfluenceStrategy>
World class contains the list of the Islands that represents the world of the game. It also contains an attribute InfluenceStrategy that allowed changing dynamically the algorithm used to calculate the Influence of an Island (pattern Strategy).

    • checkEntry

      public boolean checkEntry(Island island)
      Method checkEntry checks if the Island has any noEntryTiles on it, if presents removes one and returns false, otherwise returns true.
      Returns:
      a boolean, true when the influence can be calculated, otherwise is false

    • checkConquest

      public Optional<Player> checkConquest(HashMap<Player,Integer> mapInfluence, ArrayList<Player> players, Island island)
      Method checkConquest checks if the island must change the owner.
      Parameters:
      mapInfluence - Map Player, Integer - The map of the island's influence.
      players - List Player - The list of the players.
      island - Island - The island that has to be checked.
      Returns:
      the new owner, if it is different from the old onw or if there aren't multiple players with the same influence.

    • getInfluenceIsland

      public HashMap<Player,Integer> getInfluenceIsland(Island i, HashMap<ColorS,Player> profs, ArrayList<Player> players)
      Method getInfluenceIsland calculate the influence for every single player using the method getInfluence and put the result in a map.
      Parameters:
      i - Island - the island on which the influence is calculated.
      profs - Map ColorS, Player - Map that contains the association of a prof and the owner.
      players - List Player - List where are contained all the players of the game.
      Returns:
      a map with every player and his influence on the Island i.

    • join

      public Island join(Island i1, Island i2)
      Method join merges two island, remove the two original Island from the List and add the new one.
      Parameters:
      i1 - Island - first island to join.
      i2 - Island - second island to join.
      Returns:
      the new Island.

      public void checkJoin(Island i)
